#summary About the JW Player Ad Streamer
#sidebar TableOfContents

The JW Player Ad Streamer is an implementation of an OpenX Ad Serving plugin for Longtail Video's JW Player.

The implementation uses the [VASTAs3FrameworkOverview generic VAST framework].

Accordingly, the implementation is basically a playlist controller that uses the generic VAST framework to request a VAST response from OpenX before forming an XSPF playlist that is fed into JW Player.

Playlist items can be either RTMP or HTTP based video streams.

View these [JWPlayerOpenXExamples  examples] to get a quick perspective on how to configure the JW Player Ad Streamer to deliver a variety of linear video, (overlay in development now) and companion ads.
